metadata.title: RHSA-2020:3616: OpenShift Container Platform 4.3.35 jenkins-2-plugins security update (Important)
metadata.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is Red Hat's cloud computing
Kubernetes application platform solution designed for on-premise or private
cloud deployments.

Security Fix(es):

* jenkins-script-security-plugin: sandbox protection bypass led to arbitrary code execution in sandboxed scripts (CVE-2019-16538)

* jenkins-pipeline-groovy-plugin: sandbox protection bypass through default parameter expressions in CPS-transformed methods (CVE-2020-2109)

* jenkins-script-security-plugin: sandbox protection bypass during script compilation phase by applying AST transforming annotations (CVE-2020-2110)

* jenkins-script-security-plugin: sandbox protection bypass via crafted constructor calls and crafted constructor bodies (CVE-2020-2134)

* jenkins-script-security-plugin: sandbox protection bypass led to arbitrary code execution (CVE-2020-2135)

* jenkins-subversion-plugin: XSS in project repository base URL (CVE-2020-2111)

* jenkins-git-plugin: stored cross-site scripting (CVE-2020-2136)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2020-2135 jenkins-script-security-plugin: sandbox protection bypass leads to arbitrary code execution
CVE-2020-2134 jenkins-script-security-plugin: sandbox protection bypass via crafted constructor calls and crafted constructor bodies
CVE-2020-2110 jenkins-script-security-plugin: sandbox protection bypass during script compilation phase by applying AST transforming annotations
CVE-2020-2109 jenkins-pipeline-groovy-plugin: sandbox protection bypass through default parameter expressions in CPS-transformed methods
CVE-2020-2111 jenkins-subversion-plugin: XSS in project repository base url
CVE-2019-16538 jenkins-script-security-plugin: sandbox protection bypass leads to execute arbitrary code in sandboxed scripts

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
